caption.p: Hemagglutination inhibition (HI) titer of serum samples from contact or pigs infected with IBV or IDV at 8 dpi (6 dpc). HI assay was performed for serum samples collected from three control pigs, three contact pigs, and four infected pigs at 8 dpi based on a standard protocol. HI titer â‰¥ 20 is judged as positive.
